website_summaries.verdict: Eliminate the guesswork and measuring with these adjustable porcelain-coated steel flavorizer bars.
pros: Bars extend from 11.75 to 21 inches long
Prevents flare-ups, direct exposure to flame, prolongs life of burners and distributes heat evenly
Replaces heat tents for side-to-side and front-to-back burners
M5 bolts and wing nuts included
cons: The overlapping pieces can cover some of the heat holes when adjusted to fit some models

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product, but so far I am a big fan. It was very easy to install, and fit my grill without any problem. The material is actually thicker and heavier than my original Heat platter. I also turned on the Grill for about 15 minutes and get it really hot, heat distribution was excellent and I had no problem with coating getting off or smell like some other reviews are saying. So far great product, happy bbq season 😀
customer_reviews.author: Ivo

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The originals that came with my grill basically got burned through. They were thin and flimsy to begin with so not surprise they deteriorated so bad. These I got because I read they were adjustable and I just didn’t have the time to check the measurement on my grill. Of course that’s to amazon speedy shipping I got these a day after ordering. Putting together was a breeze. I measured one in my grill the just size the rest off the first one. These are so much thicker and heavier than the originals that came with the grill. I’ve fired up the grill once since they were installed and everything is working wonderful. I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C

customer_reviews.title: Has Breathed New Life Into Our Brinkmann Gas Grill
customer_reviews.text: No complaints so far. Easy to adjust to length and replaced the original heat tents which were about to disintegrate. We have used the grill many times since installing and they are holding up well. Actually are much heavier duty than the original heat tents. Has breathed new life into our cheap Brinkmann gas grill. I did have to buy 2 sets are our grill has 5 burners so that leaves us with one spare. I did see some other sets but only found sets of 3 or 4 unless you bought the Brinkmann brand which were $19.95 each!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Warning: fumes — heat before cooking!
customer_reviews.text: The paint on the tents them selves appears to be heat resistant but not that used on the screws. The screws came black, but the paint quickly burned off, making various nasty fumes. Why not just use stainless screws? Otherwise the quality appears good.
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Burn coating off first before grilling
customer_reviews.text: Does as expected. WARNING the peices are coated, set grill to high heat until coating is burned off before grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Made my grill new again
customer_reviews.text: I almost tossed my grill out to the curb after my heat plates rusted through and turned into a giant mess in the bottom of my grill. My friend recommended just replacing these so I pulled out my industrial work shop vac and sucked out all the crud from the previous rusty mess, scrubbed it a bit then bought these. Easy peasy to install and now my grill looks and acts like new again! Love it!!!! Love that they are super adjustable to fit your width. So far I've fired it up several times and no rusting or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Ranya

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable heat plates
customer_reviews.text: I have a odd-sized grill that I could not find pre-cut length heat plates for. They were either too short, or the right length but too tall. Bought these to replace one and just went ahead and replaced them all due to how well they worked. So far no rust but its coming to the end of season one. don't expect more than two seasons out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy You Time If Your Grill Is Still In Decent Shape
customer_reviews.text: They adjusted to fit my 4-burner BHG and appear to be of acceptable quality. It's doubtful they will last any longer than the originals but they sure beat the rusted out, disintegrating heat tents I replaced them with. The burners on my grill are still in good shape, so I am hoping these tents will buy me another year or two before having to put my grill to the curb. At this cost, it's definitely worth the money. Now if I could only find a replacement drip tray!
customer_reviews.author: Zizerzazz

customer_reviews.title: Revived Tired Grill
customer_reviews.text: Old heat tents had rusted out and so was getting lots of cool spots in my Napoleon Triumph grill. These are good strong gauge metal and very good at spreading the heat and protecting the burners. But two things keep it from 5 stars: The paint or enamel on the metal screws that hold it together are different from the plates and it burns off toxic smelling smoke at least the first times you use it. Second, they should have made the long cuts in the metal to be on the bottom facing the burner rather than facing up where they may catch and trap grease over time. Overall, breathes life in to an aging grill!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Walker

customer_reviews.title: Universal Heat Shields Help My Beloved Grill Last and Last and Last
customer_reviews.text: I can't bring myself to give up my old faithful grill that I've had for years. So every couple years I invest in a new set of heat shields to protect the burners and these worked great. Easily adjustable to make for a perfect fit and they can be cleaned quickly and easily if you get a lot of buildup (I grill at least a couple times a week even during winter). If you're like me and want to make that old grill last and last, these are a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Universal?  Yes!  Long Lasting?  Not so much
customer_reviews.text: My heat tents rusted out and needed replacing. But there were so many different type out there, and who knew what size fit my $200 Lowes grill?? I bought this since it was adjustable and that part worked well --- they're not the prettiest, due to a nut that lets you adjust them, but they're functional and worked great fitting the grill perfectly. However after a few weeks of grilling I noticed they were already starting to show significant wear themselves... I rather get another $199 Lowes grill than keep spending $30 here and there on different replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: WAYNE C.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these. It will poison your food with paint fumes
customer_reviews.text: As a few other have said. The fumes from these will get into your food . I seasoned them twice before cooking. The paint from the screw melted off and emitted a chemical odor. The black paint faded, bubbled and started to peel on the underside. I cooked a whole chicken and had to throw it away because it tasted awful and upset my iron stomach. I guess next time I'll get stainless steel just to be safe. Thank god for Amazons Kohl's return option. That's the only plus for these.
customer_reviews.author: rob a

customer_reviews.title: Best replacement parts possibly made
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product I wish my beautiful uniflame gold barbecue had these since the day I owned them the heat distribution is perfect which I always had a problem with before these are amazing and I will only buy from this company for now on for my replacement parts for my BBQ
customer_reviews.author: Tim c

customer_reviews.title: sits low, however seems to do the job
customer_reviews.text: they sit a lot lower than my original, however it does not seem to make much of a difference. the set screws will immediately look bad upon letting it heat up after your first time but the trays themselves seem fine. it was a very inexpensive fix for my older grill that i never cover.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had these a week but they seem to be good quality not flimsy like I thought the wing nuts and bolts are not painted but there is a coating on them That needs to burn off I ran my grill for 2 hours and there was still an Odor the next day when I went to cook but nothing to bad worth complaining about. These hopefully don’t become lose over time with being adjustable
customer_reviews.author: Bacer

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a brand new grill
customer_reviews.text: We have had our grill for 5 years and the old grates just started falling a part. We bought this as a replacement and wow. It’s like a brand new grill. It gets to higher temperature quicker than the original ones. The installation was super easy, no guessing the size or anything. The only downside Is that we needed 5 and this is 4 pack. We just don’t use the last burner
customer_reviews.author: Bv88

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I must have not read the size right, but these are smaller than I anticipated them being. I must have been so comfortable with the fact that they can be lengthened and shortened that I didn't pay attention to the width. They seem to work - I've cooked successfully several times with them - but I will be looking for wider ones the next time I need to replace these.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement
customer_reviews.text: My grill parts are slowly rusting away and I am replacing them the best way that I can since the manufacturer is no longer selling replacements. While I was not able to find any that were the same size (width and length) as I was replacing, being able to adjust these for length wound up working perfectly. It was worth purchasing the 4 pack even though I only needed 2. That just means I'll be able to replace these if they rust away. I would have attached before and after pictures, but I couldn't see where to attach them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Love that they are adjustable - much thicker than I expected
customer_reviews.text: These have been great so far on my old grill. I love that they are adjustable so they fit perfect. I must say they are much better quality than I expected. The metal is much thicker than the last set I purchased at my local big box store and I am sure they will last much longer. They are thicker than the ones that came with my grill when it was new I am sure. Glad my grill cooks more even again! Good set, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. The metal is fairly heavy, heavier than the original manufacturer parts. Easily assembled. Snip the plastic wire tie holding the paired parts, adjust to the length you need and tighten the bolts with wingnuts. The bolts and wingnuts are of really good quality....not the cheap Chinese crap you often see. Absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: OathKeeper

customer_reviews.title: Made our grill just like new!
customer_reviews.text: The heat shields for our grill arrived fast, installed easily and work just fine! My husband, who is the 'griller' when it comes to cooking outside, was very pleased to order them from amazon and discover they were just the exact thing he needed to put a new life into our grill. We'd order them again. Who knows, perhaps we will!
customer_reviews.author: J.Miller

customer_reviews.title: They worked.
customer_reviews.text: Older grill that the originals had rotted out on and made the grill useless almost. Put these in and the heat distribution worked just fine. Buying brand name is a waste of good money, they don't do anything that these won't do. And finding the right length is a pain, only one set was made for this grill and it was twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: john armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They adjust - length wise to fit. Once you have the fit correct just place them in position. They seem to distribute the heat well and have a bit of a coating on them although they will eventually rust out just like the originals did. If you are looking to prolong the life of your grill and just need some parts these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Solaurie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - works as I would expect them to
customer_reviews.text: Real simple review, these were easy to install and adjust with fingers, I didn't even need additional tools. They fit into my grill just fine and provide a good amount of deflection. I almost think too much, but the ones I removed was cheap little aluminum ones (it felt like). These are a heavy gauge metal that deflects the heat well. I will keep these around and order them again if and when they deteriorate from usage.
customer_reviews.author: IDad D4

customer_reviews.title: Hazard!!! Paint burned off. Not food safe!
customer_reviews.text: The paint burned off these and I didn’t notice until I went to grill the next time and it was too late to send back.
customer_reviews.author: KLV

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: These parts were as advertised, the only reason I gave it a 4 out of 5 stars instead of a 5 out of 5 is because a couple of the nuts that came with the package did not thread with the corresponding screws and I had to buy a couple from the local hardware store which wasn't a big deal but I think that the manufacturer should look into that. Overall a good product and serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: I. Radas

customer_reviews.title: Great Heat Distribution
customer_reviews.text: We replaced the original heat plate shields on our grill. It didn't fit exactly, so I had to modify these by snipping a few corners off. Once it fit, the heat distribution has never been better. My grill cooks better and more evenly then when I first bought the grill
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable heat shields meant 2-for-1 for us
customer_reviews.text: Our small grill takes the smallest size listed for the flame covers, or about 11 3/4" long. After receiving the grill flame covers (heat shields), we determined that just one of the metal pieces nicely fits our grill, the 2nd piece (which normally slides in and out to adjust to the correct length) was not even needed. So, unwittingly we ended up with a 2nd set of pieces - definitely a great deal, for small size grills like ours!
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Snoke

customer_reviews.title: So easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. The original heat plate shields on my grill were old and impossible to clean anymore. These are adjustable so the fit was good and so easy to clean. After they cool down, just put them in hot, soapy water and wash and rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace some rusted heat shields in an old broil king. They came right away and were super easy to install. The quality is great and would definitely buy from them again. I would recommend them to anyone looking for these products.
customer_reviews.author: Pitty

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My old shields were burnt through and not doing their job. I thought I was going to have to get a whole new grill. I saw these on Amazon and decided to try them. They work great! Saved me $200 for a new grill. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: ConnieB

customer_reviews.title: ... maneuver to get them to sit in there (my bad, didn't even LOOK ahead of time to make ...
customer_reviews.text: We had to kind of maneuver to get them to sit in there (my bad, didn't even LOOK ahead of time to make sure that the fittings were compatible) but now that it is, we LOVE it! They're wider and more solid than the original ones, so we actually find that it gives us a much more evenly heated cooking surface.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a grill I spent $40 on which did not come with shields. A couple hours of cleaning later (I don't think it had ever been cleaned) and was a snap to put these on, they fit perfectly and only took about 5 mins to do all of them. They do the job well in my opinion, definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from buying a new grill!
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly! My old ones had rust that had eaten through and caused holes in places. These saved my grill! They were so easy to install. No more flare ups and the heat distribution is great. Thank you for saving me from having to buy a new grill!
customer_reviews.author: Egan’s Bruv

customer_reviews.title: Like a New Grill
customer_reviews.text: Simple and I mean super simple to install. No tools needed. The heat tents made my old grill work like new. Even heat distribution and easy to clean. Lifts off the gas line with no problem. Have used it several months and it shows no signs of wear. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: missy le chat

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the strong quality of the heat plates and ease of installation because of their adjustability. We just set them in place and were done! They are so much better made than the ones that came with our grill!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kunes

customer_reviews.title: NOT Universal
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving it 3 stars because it doesn't fit my grill and thus is NOT a universal replacement. It might fit a lot of grills and it is indeed adjustable, but it didn't fit mine. Granted, mine is an off-brand, but still....
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Henry

customer_reviews.title: Better than what came w grill
customer_reviews.text: Mine has 3 burners so i actually got a extra one to use to replace the one i use the most. Thinker metal than what came w grill and it as two pieces for each so wast twcie or 3xs as long! Definitely recommend! 5 stars all day
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product SIX stars if it was possible. It was meticulously packaged, the company really cares & it was here ahead of time. Sturdy manufacturing, & the heat distribution is perfect, better than what the grille came with. Well spent 22 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Coyote H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit , price, and performance.
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. Looks like they will last a long time. Excellent value and price. Fit our grill perfectly which we purchased from Sam's Club and could not find replacements for it from them.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Mellecker

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement product
customer_reviews.text: I bought thes to replace my originals on my charbroil gas grill. Very easy to adjust and fit. They have been holding up better than the originals and make grilling much easier with the distributed heat.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin E. Taylor Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - easy to adjust length.
customer_reviews.text: Have a small grill with 14" long heat plates that needed replaced. I bought these because I couldn't find this length. They were easy to adjust and, are well made. Work great with my grill.
customer_reviews.author: Kat M

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Seems legit, havent made any food on the grill yet, but they fit nicely. They are however about 1/8th of an inch narrower than the stock covers on each side. Assembly was pretty strait forward
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sutcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Accurate description.
customer_reviews.text: While the price was great, easy installation, and perfect heat distribution, I feel a bit short changed. The dimensions for maximum length are inaccurate. The heat shields I received will only extend to 18 3/4” but the product description specifically stated 21 inches. They barely fit inside my grill and I have to readjust them after each cook because one end slides off into the burners. Not a great design. But if you have a grill less than 18 3/4” in length they are perfect replacements for rusty and degraded heat shields.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen H.

customer_reviews.title: Great case got price
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th one of these I gave bought, they are very nice well built and have room for mags. The Velcro straps holds rifle securely I will buy more of these when I need another case.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F

customer_reviews.title: Putting off a new grill!
customer_reviews.text: My husband quickly and efficiently installed new heat plates in our grill (4-5 years old) to extend the life. This was an easy install and they work great. Happy to put off buying an entire new grill with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie M

customer_reviews.title: Even flame is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My grill is so old and when I would grill the flame wasn't distributed evenly. I looked all over until I checked Amazon, and of course they had it, no surprise. Everything cooks evenly!
customer_reviews.author: Marie B. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Giving me another year+ out of my old grill.
customer_reviews.text: Real easy to install. Very adjustable, so they fit fine. The shields on my old grill rusted away, but everything else worked fine. These shields are saving me from having to buy another grill and are giving me at least another summer out of my 8 year old grill
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Feels like I have a whole new grill!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I thought I was going to have to buy a new grill because it was so expensive to replace these things. When I saw these adjustable size ones I decided, for the price, I would give them a try. I feel like I have a whole new grill! These are fantastic! I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Abr9965

customer_reviews.title: Good versatile product
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it would fit my grill but it is perfect. Nice product and replacing the old shields makes the grill work like new again. Will keep this product in mind for possible future needs.
customer_reviews.author: John O

customer_reviews.title: Update for our BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Our old heat plate shields were wasted & deteriorating making the BBQ look rundown. Pulled the old ones out dropped these in place and its like a mini-facelift! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Veronica K.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I think these will last a lot longer than the previous heat plates I purchased. They seem to be heavy duty and well made. They are adjustable so they fit just about any grill.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne E

customer_reviews.title: Brought life back to my grill!
customer_reviews.text: These have been hugely beneficial in my grilling. These have cleaned up my grill very nicely and helped to even out the heat. The old ones were broken and falling apart. These were super east to install (like took a couple mins max) and distribute heat well. Great value for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: These replacement shields just added new life to my grill.
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my 3 year old, heavily used grill. I purchased 3 thinking I would have a spare, but when I installed them I realized that I didn't measure the width of the shield that I was replacing and needed two for each burner. It wasn't an issue to order one more - but I could have saved a couple dollars if I had taken the time to measure the width and just ordered 4 to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Lozaka

customer_reviews.title: UNICOOK Universal Replacement Heavy Duty Heat Plate Shield
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and ordered these shields for my husband's gas grill. They are a fraction of the cost of replacement parts offered by actual grill manufacturer. So far, we could not be happier with this purchase. Worth every penny?
customer_reviews.author: Karen C. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive way to prolong the use of our grill.
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice replacement for the rusty ones that were in our grill. They are relatively heavy, very easy to install, and are working well. It was ridiculous to buy a new grill when we only needed to replace these and the lava rocks.
customer_reviews.author: gypsysmom

customer_reviews.title: Saved me  from buying a new grill!
customer_reviews.text: I got a second had grill which worked just fine but was missing the heat shields. I was getting frustrated burning the meat and was ready to buy a new grill for $300 but thought I'd check on Amazon to see if they had shields that fit my grill. To my surprise I found these adjustable shields, I was dubious about the 'adjustable' portion but took the chance. They worked perfectly! They spread to the span you need and they stay in place. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect. I replaced the old metal ones with these porcelain ones and I'd never have the metal ones again ! Easy to wipe off and look brand new. Only took a few minutes to change them out ! Great value for money. Also very thick, not flimsy at all.
customer_reviews.author: JudyR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Our old ones were falling apart! These were so easy to adjust (I adjusted the first, then lined the other 2 up comparing to the first one). Work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Lorie B

customer_reviews.title: Like New
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 10 yr. old plus super deluxe gas grill. I wanted to get one more season out of the grill. These work well and gave my grill new life. The fit well, work well and, after a few uses, I do not anticipate any problems with them. I would buy these again when the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Copeland

customer_reviews.title: flexable
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable size is good as it can fit all grills. i also like the heat distribution , i feel it's better than my older ones (but also they were very old)
customer_reviews.author: Aiman

customer_reviews.title: Better than new.
customer_reviews.text: These are much more stout than the ones that came with my grill - that didn’t last 2 years. No measurements no fuss. Screw them together and drop them in.
customer_reviews.author: James Keyser

customer_reviews.title: Great temporary fix
customer_reviews.text: For a cheaper universal set it does the job. They do not secure to my grill so they tilt over if grill gets bumped. Heat isn’t fully even. But for the money spent I am satisfied. They were a great find when I was in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Landmark

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and adjustable to fit alot of grills
customer_reviews.text: Went together easy, no tools needed and they fit our grill perfectly. Well worth the price to replace the old ones and there adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: The paint comes off after a few uses but still holding fine.
customer_reviews.text: They work as they should. I needed something narrower than the plates my grill came with to get a little more charcoal on my meats. The paint comes off after a few uses but still holding fine.
customer_reviews.author: VDB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: They are heavy and well made. Better than the deflectors that came on the bbq. Very happy to be able to fix my bbq rather than buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Dana H

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: They work perfectly and can be adjusted to fit perfectly. They were just what I needed since standard sizes would not fit.
customer_reviews.author: pc

customer_reviews.title: Better than the original
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with the quality and adjustable feature to fit most grills. It will add years of life to your gas grill.
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: Better than other universal heat plates
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased replacement heat diffusers at big box stores in the past. This year they are difficult to find, so I ordered this set of three from Amazon. They arrived in two days. They are heavier duty than others. They are already black, so they don't turn color. The best feature is the screw/wing nut assembly so that you get a perfect, no-slide, fit to your grill. I suspect I won't have to replace these for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Galas

customer_reviews.title: great concept universal design works very well
customer_reviews.text: these plates are very adjustable and functionally very good. were very easy to install we will see if durability factor holds up to the heat test so far im very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Naratil-freed

customer_reviews.title: They are what they are
customer_reviews.text: I think you would maybe get two years out of these before the rust out and fall apart. Thin metal, not as wide as my original ones and this far cooking once do not appear to disperse heat evenly. They are what they are a cheap bar replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Material
customer_reviews.text: Being adjustable they are a perfect fit for my el cheapo off brand grill. Thick gauge metal. Fast shipping. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: GDW.

customer_reviews.title: Work great, will extend the life of my grill a few more years.
customer_reviews.text: Work well, super-easy to adjust without tools. Very widely adjustable....in my case the shortest possible overall length worked great. The old heat plates in my grill were rusted and perforated and over time I had lived with the uneven cooking on the grill. After installation I have grilled over them 2x so far and they work great. Should have purchased these a while ago, very even cooking now and an easy 'refresh' on an old grill.
customer_reviews.author: Todd T.

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably Priced, universal fit
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in less than 10 minutes. They work great. Thick metal so they should last. We grill 3 or 4 times a week so well used
customer_reviews.author: Stephan S.

customer_reviews.title: New Life for an old grill
customer_reviews.text: I have not fired up the grill yet so I can not evaluate the heat distribution but I am sure since everything else is Five Star the heat will be too.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile, worked great
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality and worked wonderfully. I was having terrible flame ups and these guys solved those problems!
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality just pay attention to how your old ones are in there. My old ones had tabs that fit into little slits... These dont have the little tabs. Thats y fault though! I still made it work and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied?

customer_reviews.title: Impressive, so far!!
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased to replace tents for a Weber Spirit gas grill. They fit perfectly into the pre-fab slots. Haven’t cooked with them yet, but not anticipating an issue. Couldn’t find a value like this, locally.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Jweid

customer_reviews.title: Don't throw out your old grill.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great quality. I was ready to toss my old grill, I installed these heat spreaders so that I could give the grill away. After using the grill with the new parts I decided it was worth keeping.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Not universal
customer_reviews.text: Product is not universal, it did not fit our standard grill which is just from Walmart. It has the wrong prongs for ours.
customer_reviews.author: C&B

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and half the price of originals!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are adjustable. Easy to install and work just as good as the originals but less the price.
customer_reviews.author: James D. P.

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable for a Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly as described. The heat shields are heavy duty and adjustable. I installed them and was cooking with gas in about 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Easternart

customer_reviews.title: Good price and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. One of the heat plates peeled immediately after 1 use. Good price and works as advertised. The screws and wing nuts are hit or miss, 2 of mine just spin and don't tighten. So 3 out of 4 work which is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Been in the BBQ for a month now and they're holding up well. Adjustable plates made for simple install.
customer_reviews.author: DMoore

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Universal
customer_reviews.text: Not quite universal enough. My choices were to make some cuts or bends. I bent the ends, which caused the powder coating to flake off. I have a Smoke Hollow grill.
customer_reviews.author: jvd

customer_reviews.title: A great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to install, easy to adjust to whatever length you need. Thick metal. Better than most. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement!
customer_reviews.text: It works like it should. Much cheaper on here than at big box stores. Made my grill like new again!
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for that worn out grill that you want to make last longer. Easy. Cheap. Grill works like new now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Adjustable to fit most grills. Seem to spread heat evenly. Quick fix for the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I have an old grill and bought these to replace my rusted out ones. They were good quality and serve the purpose I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Big E

customer_reviews.title: Great services,  on the time
customer_reviews.text: a little disappointed as it says universal, but they were not universal to my needs. We had to adapt them to my grill, so I gave them use for what I needed them. excellent service, arrived the day and time indicated. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chalina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: These parts were very easy to adjust and install in my BBQ. They work great for dissipating heat and even cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Tinker

customer_reviews.title: Great universal replacement!
customer_reviews.text: These are FANTASTIC! I was looking all over for grill tents for my grill and my specific model # was so hard to find. I was so happy when I came across these. Being able to adjust them makes it super easy to fit any grill. I just wish they sold them in packs of 4 since that is common for most grills.
customer_reviews.author: khaleesi27

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement part for a variety of gas grills
customer_reviews.text: Items came on time and as listed. Installed instantly and used that night. Would gladly use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the functionality and easiness of this product. Great value and does what its supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Rose

customer_reviews.title: work just fine
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get the original version anymore. These work just fine for a lot less money.
customer_reviews.author: Iboat

customer_reviews.title: Easy fit!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to replace the ones that came with our old grill that is not available anymore. Great to find a product that is so adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ersepke

customer_reviews.title: Can use my grill again
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, mine were rusted out,non existent. I didn’t have to buy a new grill
customer_reviews.author: beverly worley

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Value!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Blue Rhino gas/propane grill. The heat plate shields had deteriorated after a few years of use. When I searched their website for replacements I was shocked how much they were. Searched Amazon and came across these and being adjustable they fit perfectly AND cost less for the 3-pack then just 1 from Blue Rhino! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: R. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: FITS and WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: FITS and WORKS GREAT. This is a must buy!! works great and fits. Looks great too
customer_reviews.author: Ben

product_meta.title: Unicook Universal Replacement Heavy Duty Adjustable Porcelain Steel Heat Plate Shield, Heat Tent, Flavorizer Bar, Burner Cover, Flame Tamer for Gas Grill, Extends from 11.75" up to 21" L, 4 Pack
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:4 Best Gas Grill Replacement Parts for Its Cost!
Some of you grill parts maybe rust and will wear out after a certain amount of time and use. We know you would prefer to keep your favorite grill running rather than leaving it at the curb on trash day. 
It is time to replace your grill parts. You will get your grill cooking like new for a fraction of the cost of a new one with Unicook replacement parts! More DIY fun! Environmentally friendly! 

Key Features of Unicook Grill Parts 
--Universal Fit Most of Unicook grill parts are designed as a universal item, whose size is adjustable to fit your grill, fit different brands and gas grill models in the market. 
--Heavy Duty Materials Thicker is better! All the materials of Unicook replacement parts are more heavy duty than most original ones that come with your grill, last longer.
--Easy Assembling Unicook grill parts are very easy to install. The new grill parts will be assembled in minutes following the instruction manuals included. 

Care and Use
Please check the size and shape of your original parts and compare with the specs on our product listing before ordering.
Specific safety, repair and maintenance information varies between grill models and brands. Always refer to your owners’ manual.
feature_bullets: Extends from 11.75” up to 21” long, 3.75” wide, fits most gas grills. If installed reversely, the length will be extended from 11.75” to 18.37” only
Prevents flare-ups and protects burners to prolong life, prevents direct exposure to flame and distributes heat evenly
Replaces heat tents for side-to-side and front-to-back burners. Upgraded Stainless Steel M5 bolts and wing nuts are included, easy to install
Thickness of porcelain steel is 1.2mm, heavy duty porcelain-coated steel construction; Thicker is better and last longer!
Stainless Steel version is also available, click the "UNICOOK" button (top middle of the page) to get more details about the S/S version

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,411 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
